contributing: If you'd like to help provide translations for this app,
please update the 'values' in these "KEY": "Value", pairs.
(To revise an existing translation, try grabbing it at this
same url with a different 2-character culture code)
We'll thank you 'til your better paid!
BROWSE-LIST-EMPTY: No topologies have been published yet.
DELETE-TOPO-PROMPT: Please confirm you intend to delete this Topology along with its templates.
GAME-LIST-EMPTY: You've got no mojo right now.
NAME: Name
PLAYER-LIST-EMPTY: You've got no friends right now.
WORKSPACE-LIST-EMPTY: You've got no topo right now.

AUTH.CONFIRMATION-NEEDS-USERNAME: Please specify the username to confirm.

HELP.CLONE-TEMPLATE: This machine is linked from a different topology; you cannot save disk changes. If you plan to alter the disk, ensure the machine is not deployed and then clone it
HELP.DESCRIPTION: An application for building and running virtual topologies.
HELP.EXTERNAL-URL: If your Markdown document is hosted elsewhere, enter the url here. This value overrides the internal Markdown document.
HELP.HIDDEN-TEMPLATE: Check this to prevent console access to this vm when deployed in a gamespace.
HELP.HOME-BROWSE: Looking to find and run an existing topology?  Browse the topology library to find what you need!
HELP.HOME-WORK: Want to build your own topology?  Or continue work on something you've started?  Head to your workspace to access your stuff.
HELP.HOME-PLAY: Already have one running?  Head here to pick up where you left off.
HELP.NETWORKS: Enter a space-delimited list of network names. Nics are assigned respectively. (Requires redeployment)
HELP.PUBLISH: When published, this topology is discoverable in the browser.
HELP.SHARE: Distribute this link to people you want to help build this topology.

EXCEPTION.GAMESPACELIMIT: The gamespace limit for individuals prevented your action.
EXCEPTION.GENERAL: Sorry for this generic error message. We'll get to the bottom of it.
EXCEPTION.INVALIDOPERATION: Can't do that. Probably because a resource doesn't exist
EXCEPTION.PARENTTEMPLATE: This template is linked by other templates, so your action cannot be completed.
EXCEPTION.WORKSPACETEMPLATELIMIT: The template limit for this workspace prevented your action.
